TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintJobException extends System.Printing.PrintSystemException
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrintJobException extends System.Printing.PrintSystemException

Docs.summary: The exception that occurs when the print job does not run correctly.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!CAUTION] > Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
